Trade/Device Name(s): IDEAL LIFE Gluco-Manager™ GMM 0001 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): IDEAL LIFE Gluco-Manager™ GMM 0001 Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for IDEAL LIFE Gluco-Manager™ GMM 0001 Blood Glucose Monitoring System using electrochemical method for quantitative glucose measurement
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites for self-testing by people with diabetes or healthcare professionals, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes
